titleStmt.title: Eclectical chiliasm, or, A discourse concerning the state of things from the beginning of the Millennium to the end of the world
titleStmt.author: T. F., 17th cent.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for the author and sold by C. Brome at the Gun, at the west end of St. Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Item at reel 1792:20 identified as Wing E157B ("no entry" in Wing 2nd ed., 1994).
Reproductions of original in the Harvard University Library.

place.placeName: the Gun, at the west end of St. Pauls Church-yard
